programme.title: Mon père
programme.desc:
(4) U.S. 1989. While his mother is in the hospital, a man winds up becoming his dad's caretaker and companion, and they grow closer than they've ever been.
Réalisation : G.D. Goldberg Gary David Goldberg
Avec : Jack Lemmon Ted Danson Olympia Dukakis

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc: (S04EP07) In this episode: Representation matters. Injured as a teenager, a young woman doesn't realize her own potential until she meets other wheelchair users in university.

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc: (S05EP34) On this episode of Double Tap TV, we're joined by Celine Lee from Amazon to discuss the company's groundbreaking collaboration with Cochlear to enhance the TV viewing experience for people with hearing implants.

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:
(S01EP01) This episode of Disrupt spotlights the talent and creativity of a musician, a poet, a comedian, a filmmaker and a choir of performers who are Deaf.
Année : 2023

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc:
(S01EP03) Depictions of the sex lives of people with disabilities are almost non-existent in pop culture. Rachele asks why, and sets out on a mission to change it.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S02EP01) Emilee is done with her girl-next-door look. But as someone who is partially sighted, she's unsure about navigating fashion and beauty on her own. She wants tips, tricks and hacks on how to put together a professional, polished look independently.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
Michael Coteau, Liberal MPP, and Christopher Skeete, Coalition Avenir Québec MLA, debate Bill 21, the law in Québec that bans public servants (such as judges, police officers and teachers).
Année : 2017

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S03EP08) In the episode of Dish with Mary, Mary visits Chef Kyle Bruce, owner of the 2x4 Diner in Wainfleet, Ont. Chef Kyle shares his journey from working for NORAD to attending culinary school in Vancouver.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP10) In an effort to boost the workshop's organization, Chris and Alex build an entryway storage unit and a rolling tool cart.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S03EP09) Warm up as Chef Mike Ward drops in to talk soups and stews with Christine and Carl.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S06EP02) Learn more about Young Carers, who are children under the age of 18 in a care-giving role for a parent, grandparent, sibling or relative with a chronic or life-threatening illness, disability, addiction or mental illness, among others.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP11) Chris and Alex help a coffee enthusiast start the day right, by turning an armoire into a coffee bar. Later, they help a friend enjoy his evenings by building a swing bed for his backyard.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S05EP12) Detective Murdoch investigates the murder of a member of the Toronto Wellingtons hockey team.
Année : 2008

Scénario : Lori Spring

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S06EP04) We visit the Kamloops Waterski club and their adaptive clinic, where everyone has the opportunity to tip their toes in the water and try water skiing. Get on the water and take the disability out of the sport.
Année : 2008

programme.desc:

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S02EP07) Unsettling news arrives from Hamilton, and it may fracture Jack and Elizabeth's bond. Abigail attempts to forgive Bill. Lee asks Rosemary to assist in the battle against Gowen.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc:

programme.desc:

programme.desc:

programme.desc:

programme.desc:
